meanings.definition: To combine two or more numbers to find their total.
meanings.sent1: I will add two apples and three oranges to see how many fruits I have in total.
meanings.sent2: Please add the numbers on the board to get the correct answer.
meanings.sent3: I tried to add my toys and my brother's toys, but they were too many to count!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter added a joyful melody to the room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons added a festive touch to the party.

meanings.definition: To join or unite something to something else in order to increase the size, quantity, or number.
meanings.sent1: Let's add more sugar to make the cake sweeter.
meanings.sent2: She decided to add more flowers to the bouquet for a fuller look.
meanings.sent3: I will add more books to my collection to fill up the empty shelf.
meanings.sent4: His dedication added strength to the team's efforts.
meanings.sent5: The new paint color added vibrancy to the room.
